name: help
description: Information about the bot and a list of available commands.

name: set
description: Set or change your username color. Accepts a primary color and optional secondary color (hex, CSS name, mention another user, or 'random').

name: remove
description: Remove your username color. Removes the bot-managed color role from your account.

name: check
description: Get color information and a preview image (HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK).

name: force
description: Modify another user's username color or remove/purge bot-created color roles (admin only).

options.name: set
options.description: Set or change another user's username color. Accepts hex, CSS color name, mention, or 'random'. Requires administrator privileges.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove another user's username color. Requires administrator privileges.

options.name: purge
options.description: Delete HueTweaker-created color roles from the server (individual, static, or all). Requires administrator privileges.

name: setup
description: Setup the bot on your server (top role placement and static select list).

options.name: toprole
options.description: Set the top role under which HueTweaker will create and place color roles. Requires administrator privileges.

options.name: select
options.description: Configure the static color list for the `/select` command (up to 10 positions). Requires administrator privileges.
